K-Responsive-Menu

Working on Bootstrap 4

k-responsive-menu is a lightweight jQuery plugin to create responsive multi - level navigation menus with multi device support, By Bao Nguyen http://baonguyenyam.github.io/.

k-responsive-menu comes with 2 variants like horizontal, vertical menu. It gives complete responsive menu solution for any kind of websites or admin templates. The plugin has clean and well commented valid code, easy to Integrate and modify.

Menu
Features Gettings started Demo APIs & EventsGithub

Features

  • Fully Responsive multi-level Menu
  • Menu Styles: Horizontal, Vertical menu
  • Icon Support [Integrated with FontAwesome]
  • Click / Hover Events
  • Lightweight jQuery script
  • Events
  • Valid HTML5 and CSS3
  • Bootstrap Compatible
  • Easy to Integrate & customize
  • Cross-browser support
  • Clean and well commented code
  • Help documentation
Compatible Browsers

This menu has been tested and works with all the following browsers:

  • Internet Explorer 7+
  • Firefox 3+
  • Chrome 4+
  • Safari 4+
  • Opera 10+

Gettings started

This Plugins required Bootstrap Framework

Install via Bower
bower i k-responsive-menu -S
CSS

Copy-paste the stylesheet <link> into your <head> before all other stylesheets to load our CSS.

<link rel="stylesheet" href="./bower_components./css/k-responsive-menu.css">
JS

Place the following <script> near the end of your pages, right before the closing </body> tag, to enable them. jQuery must come first, then k-responsive-menu.js, and then our JavaScript plugins.

<script src="./bower_components./js/k-responsive-menu.js">

APIs

JS Default value
$(document).ready(function() {
  $('#demoResAllInOneMenu').kResponsiveMenu({
    animationSpeed: 'slow', 
    resizeWidth: 768, 
    menuType: 'horizontal',
    menuPush: null,
    menuPushPosition: 'absolute', 
    menuPushWidth: '100%',
    menuBackDrop: false, 
    menuIcon: null, 
    onResize: null,
    onComplete: null,
    onChange: null,
    onClick: null,
    onBegin: null,
    onHover: null
  });
});
Value
# Value Default Setting
1 animationSpeed 'slow' 'slow', 'fast', 200...
2 resizeWidth 768 'xs', 'sm', 'md', 'lg', 'xl', 480...
3 menuType 'horizontal' 'horizontal', 'vertical'
4 menuPush null 'right', 'left'
5 menuPushPosition 'absolute' 'fixed'
6 menuPushWidth '100%' 'px', '%', 'rem'
7 menuBackDrop false true/false
8 menuIcon null '<i class='fa fa-bars'></i>'
Events
# Value Default Setting
1 onResize
onComplete
onChange
onClick
onBegin
onHover...		 null onResize: function () {}
Default Attribute
[k-toggle-for]
Toggle menu have [k-toggle-for] value
[k-menu-map-to]
On the mobile where contents have attribute [k-menu-map-to] will be auto clone to target element value
Using Attribute only
[k-responsive-menu]
true
[k-menu-resize]
700 OR 'xs', 'sm', 'md', 'lg', 'xl'
[k-menu-icon]
<i class='fa fa-bars'></i>
[k-menu-speed]
'slow' OR 'fast', 500
[k-menu-width]
'250px' OR '100%', '40rem'
[k-menu-push]
'left' OR 'right'
[k-menu-position]
'fixed' OR 'absolute'
